publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1662 Shona Robison: Tayside Trunk Road Contracts—That the Parliament congratulates Dundee Labour councillor John Letford on his stance on the issue of the trunk road contracts covering Tayside; notes with interest his support for the SNP's vote of no confidence in Sarah Boyack at a recent full meeting of Dundee City Council, and calls upon his Labour colleagues in the Scottish Parliament to follow his example.
S1M-1662 Tayside Trunk Road Contracts (lodged on 13 February 2001) Ms Sandra White*, Michael Matheson*
S1M-1662 Tayside Trunk Road Contracts (lodged on 13 February 2001) Dorothy-Grace Elder*, Fiona Hyslop*, Brian Adam*

S1M-1662 Shona Robison: Tayside Trunk Road Contracts—That the Parliament congratulates Dundee Labour councillor John Letford on his stance on the issue of the trunk road contracts covering Tayside; notes with interest his support for the SNP's vote of no confidence in Sarah Boyack at a recent full meeting of Dundee City Council, and calls upon his Labour colleagues in the Scottish Parliament to follow his example. Supported by: Ms Sandra White, Michael Matheson, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Fiona Hyslop, Brian Adam
S1M-1662 Tayside Trunk Road Contracts (lodged on 13 February 2001) Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Gil Paterson*
S1M-1662 Tayside Trunk Road Contracts (lodged on 13 February 2001) Fiona McLeod*, Tommy Sheridan*

S1M-1662 Shona Robison: Tayside Trunk Road Contracts—That the Parliament congratulates Dundee Labour councillor John Letford on his stance on the issue of the trunk road contracts covering Tayside; notes with interest his support for the SNP's vote of no confidence in Sarah Boyack at a recent full meeting of Dundee City Council, and calls upon his Labour colleagues in the Scottish Parliament to follow his example. Supported by: Ms Sandra White, Michael Matheson, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Fiona Hyslop, Brian Adam, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Gil Paterson, Fiona McLeod, Tommy Sheridan
S1M-1662 Tayside Trunk Road Contracts (lodged on 13 February 2001) Richard Lochhead*
S1M-1662 Tayside Trunk Road Contracts (lodged on 13 February 2001) Andrew Wilson*

S1M-1662 Shona Robison: Tayside Trunk Road Contracts—That the Parliament congratulates Dundee Labour councillor John Letford on his stance on the issue of the trunk road contracts covering Tayside; notes with interest his support for the SNP's vote of no confidence in Sarah Boyack at a recent full meeting of Dundee City Council, and calls upon his Labour colleagues in the Scottish Parliament to follow his example. Supported by: Ms Sandra White, Michael Matheson, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Fiona Hyslop, Brian Adam, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Gil Paterson, Fiona McLeod, Tommy Sheridan, Richard Lochhead, Andrew Wilson
